sub_fields.label: Background color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Pick the background color of the tab and content area.

sub_fields.label: Text color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.message: Enable light text for dark backgrounds

sub_fields.label: Feature Image
sub_fields.name: feature_images
sub_fields.instructions: Select the feature image to be shown on the right hand side of the tab (underneath the text on mobile)

sub_fields.label: Float right
sub_fields.name: image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this to make the image align to the right edge of the screen

sub_fields.label: Modal ID
sub_fields.name: modal_id
sub_fields.instructions: Add this ID to your button.

fields.label: Buy Now Alternate Text
fields.name: buy_now_alternate_text
fields.instructions: This text will appear below the buy now button.

fields.label: Enabled?
fields.name: enabled_videos
fields.message: Enable to add a video slider section

sub_fields.label: Source
sub_fields.name: video_source
sub_fields.instructions: Get the ID of the video you want to add from youtube and paste it here. The ID is the part of this URL in bold - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MuAavSJ9AoA

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail
sub_fields.name: thumbnail
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a video thumbnail to show in the slider

fields.label: Show caption?
fields.name: show_caption
fields.instructions: When checked the box will display the title and caption, unchecked the box will show only the title.

fields.label: Banner description
fields.name: banner_description
fields.instructions: Write the tagline to go below the heading
